channel.title: How do i change the login message in a delta Source! Help Needed Fast
channel.description:
I know this sounds real easy, but [u]unfortunatly[/u] its not. :( Afew days ago i downloaded Dds-specz made by Bombs Pure delta 317 source: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/282618-delta-dds-specz.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/282618-delta-dds-specz.html[/url] umm, well lets get to the point. the problem is i cant change the login message to what i want. i changed the message saved it and compiled and when i log in the server, its still got the first original message. :confused: i was thinking it might be my compiler? :| Heres my compiler:
@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit
[b]PLEASE HELP ASAP![/b]

item.title: How do i change the login message in a delta Source! Help Needed Fast
item.dc:creator: @Palagerini Palagerini
item.description:
@Palagerini wrote:

Do you mean the welcome message in the command prompt?
Just put

echo Whatever text here

Or if you mean the actual game. then go to client.java and search for the current welcome message and then replace it with your own.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the login message in a delta Source! Help Needed Fast

item.title: How do i change the login message in a delta Source! Help Needed Fast
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“superwhip, post:3, topic:377794”]i do not get it.
its ment to compile the message i wrote.
but some how when i log back in after i compiled and saved “client.java”
it still has the old message. but doesnt have the new one i wrote.

Please help![/quote]Your Compiler Is Perfectly Fine But, Sometimes Your Compiler Just Doesn’t Realize That There Are Really Files There, So Try Moving It Around Lol

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change the login message in a delta Source! Help Needed Fast
item.dc:creator: @superwhip superwhip
item.description:
@superwhip wrote:

I know this sounds real easy, but unfortunatly its not.
Afew days ago i downloaded Dds-specz made by Bombs Pure delta 317 source:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/downloads/282618-delta-dds-specz.html

umm, well lets get to the point.
the problem is i cant change the login message to what i want.
i changed the message saved it and compiled and when i log in the server, its still got the first original message.
i was thinking it might be my compiler?

Heres my compiler:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/... :end echo Finished! pause exit

PLEASE HELP ASAP!
